#Digitaldistress harms economic growth and well-being and exacerbates economic, racial and geographic inequality. 

 Investment to close the #digitaldivide— + increased support for #careinfrastructure and #climateaction—are key to promote shared prosperity https://www.jec.senate.gov/public/_cache/files/cd94ad1b-d53d-4f37-aeed-f2469518fd26/infrastructure-and-the-economy---final.pdf

Digital distress is not limited to rural areas:   

67% of digitally distressed communities are completely urban.  

Only 19% are completely rural.  

The #digitaldivide hinders residents’ abilities to work, attend school and connect with loved ones. 

https://www.jec.senate.gov/public/_cache/files/bb79fbd2-4a4c-4d6e-83f2-a32e6219b013/fast-facts-digital-distress-rural-urban-final.pdf http://pbs.twimg.com/media/E8myaUjXMAEJtXc.jpg

#Digitaldistress disproportionately affects Black, Hispanic and American Indian/Alaska Native communities—While 61% of Americans identify as white, only 26% of those in digitally distressed neighborhoods identify as white.  

https://www.jec.senate.gov/public/_cache/files/489ff1d9-52d3-4fb4-8f1f-1c522dfde76b/fast-facts-digital-distress-race-ethnicity-final.pdf http://pbs.twimg.com/media/E8m3d4_WUAMm6M0.png

These states are largely concentrated in the South, which contains the majority of the most digitally distressed Congressional districts.  
 https://www.jec.senate.gov/public/_cache/files/ff2bf609-48fc-4c2a-809a-861182811f62/fast-facts-digital-distress-congressional-district-final.pdf http://pbs.twimg.com/media/E8mxkZwXMAwoNzO.png

How prevalent is #digitaldistress? 

Research finds in 6 states, more than 1 in 10 residents lives in a community that is digitally distressed.

https://www.jec.senate.gov/public/_cache/files/82b252c8-e63f-4ae3-be08-a4fa55e24321/fast-facts-digital-distress-state-final.pdf http://pbs.twimg.com/media/E8mxMsKWUAYU-u8.png

Broadband access connects communities to jobs and students to schools, but without reliable access, communities become digitally distressed. 

#Digitaldistress may be a result of poor-quality access to internet, high costs of internet or an inability to afford computers.

New from @jecdems - What we know about #digitaldistress and why investments to close the #digitaldivide and expand access to broadband are essential to long-term economic growth and stability.
